abstract: Standard & Poor's moves Ford Motor Co two notches up on its ratings ladder to stable, one notch below investment grade credit rating.
snippet: The Ford Motor Company is within one notch of an investment grade credit rating at two of the three major ratings agencies.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies

lead_paragraph: The Ford Motor Company is within one notch of an investment grade credit rating at two of the three major ratings agencies.

headline.main: S.&P. Moves Ford a Step From Investment Grade
headline.print_headline: S.& P. Raises Ford a Step Closer to Investment Grade
